title: Managers 1:1
description: Empower managers to succeed with our templates and checklists

intro: Empower your managers, through our templates and checklists, to drive a culture of performance and engagement, and build connections with their teams.
firstList: 1:1s - Regular check-ins to discuss progress and feedback with team members.
Performance - Identify and address challenges early to avoid roadblocks and enhance productivity.
Career Growth - Identify opportunities and provide support for personal and professional growth.
